comment: PSA : Never listen to an erotic ramble while cooking . Nothing says distracted like a " burn . It's not serious , but ow !
amr:
# ::snt PSA : Never listen to an erotic ramble while cooking . Nothing says distracted like a " burn . It's not serious , but ow !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (l / listen-01
                  :polarity -
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (r / ramble-02
                        :mod (e / erotic))
                  :time (c / cook-01
                        :ARG0 y)
                  :time (e2 / ever))
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "PSA")))
      :snt2 (s2 / say-01
            :ARG1 (d / distract-01
                  :ARG2-of d)
            :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                  :ARG2 (b / burn-01)))
      :snt3 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s3 / serious-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (ii / it))
            :ARG2 (o / ow
                  :mode expressive)))
